description: A nation which formerly controlled much of Central and South America, and collaborated with the http://anidb.net/ch1594 [Atlantic Federation] in the construction of the Porta Panama mass driver. Before the outbreak of war, the United States of South America had aligned itself with the http://anidb.net/ch1571 [PLANTs] and made arrangements to covertly exchange shipments of food and manufactured goods, and it refused to join the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance] once open hostilities began. On February 19, C.E. 70, Alliance forces launched an armed invasion of this nation, and its territory was annexed by the http://anidb.net/ch1594 [Atlantic Federation]. However, its independence is restored with the conclusion of the Junius Treaty on March 10, C.E. 72.
name: United States of South America
